title: 啊啊 怎么给直接刷神奇宝贝啊
author: YQ2758136148
txt_content: 就是直接刷到背包里面 怎么刷

replies.author: mine米
replies.txt_content:
/pokegive (玩家) (神奇宝贝名称)  - 某玩家直接获得一个神奇宝贝
例子：/pokegive I pikachu
/pokespawnMewtwo超梦/pokespawnRayquaza裂空座/pokespawnGroudon古拉顿/pokespawnMew梦幻/pokespawnDragonite快龙/pokespawnArticuno急冻鸟/pokespawnMoltres火焰鸟

replies.author: 我也想C啊
replies.txt_content: 补充 后面加s是闪光 例如  /pokegive 名字 pikachu s
